body_html: @cbquillen do I understand it correctly that the problem arises only when you use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES mechanism to select the GPU device used by TensorFlow, and some other mechanism (which?) to select GPU device used by another program?

body: @cbquillen do I understand it correctly that the problem arises only when you use `CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES` mechanism to select the GPU device used by TensorFlow, and some other mechanism (which?) to select GPU device used by another program?
